page.title: 08Mr Bickley (contd)
page.content: The salmon weighed about 7 pounds (weight) and would have cost about Â£20 (money) at current market price. Some of the 'big time' operators could make about Â£1000 per week and cause great damage to salmon stocks in local rivers. Water bailiffs have the power to arrest criminals and take them to the police station to be charged. The penalties for poaching can be quite severe for anybody who is caught for instance 6 months in prison or fines of up to Â£400. However, these penalties are considered inadequate and water authorities are hoping that the laws will be strengthened in the near future.
